other_tests.findings: 4+ (>10 per 1000X FIELD): POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.

The liver demonstrates homogeneous echotexture without suspicious hepatic lesion. A hyperechoic focus in the right lobe measuring 1.4 x 1.3 x 1.4 cm, a probable small hemangioma. The gallbladder wall is thickened with multiple shadowing gallstones, the largest measuring 2 cm. The common bile duct is dilated measuring 1.1 cm. The pancreatic head, neck, and body appear edematous. Mild-to-moderate amount of perihepatic ascites.
